CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
OldVersion.description: Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Swipe in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The Message List will now support Swipe from Left and Swipe from Right actions on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. As a result, some minor organization changes will also happen for the hover actions. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Swipe in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: The Message List will now support Swipe from Left and Swipe from Right actions on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. As a result, some minor organization changes will also happen for the hover actions. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Flexible Layouts
CurrentVersion.description: New flexible layout sections allow authors to build pages without the strict column structure. Web parts can be dynamically resized and moved within the flexible section.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Flexible Layouts
OldVersion.description: New flexible layout sections allow authors to build pages without the strict column structure. Web parts can be dynamically resized and moved within the flexible section.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Replace quick compose pop-up with inline appointment creation in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: When single clicking on an empty time slot on the calendar surface, the quick compose pop-up will no longer be shown - instead, you will be able to create an appointment by typing directly in the time slot on the calendar grid, just as you can in classic Outlook for Windows. There will be no change to double click behavior, the full compose form will still open as it does today. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Replace quick compose pop-up with inline appointment creation in new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: When single clicking on an empty time slot on the calendar surface, the quick compose pop-up will no longer be shown - instead, you will be able to create an appointment by typing directly in the time slot on the calendar grid, just as you can in classic Outlook for Windows. There will be no change to double click behavior, the full compose form will still open as it does today. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort and Filter improvements on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Sort and Filter will now be separate buttons in the Message List. This will make it easier to change the Sorted by and the Filtered by values separately. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Sort and Filter improvements on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Sort and Filter will now be separate buttons in the Message List. This will make it easier to change the Sorted by and the Filtered by values separately. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
OldVersion.description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromised user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections. 1. Sign in risk detections: compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections: compromise risk associated with a specific user. Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
OldVersion.description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromise user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections: 1. Sign in risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific user. - Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. - Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. - Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New Insider Risk Management Reporting Capabilities
CurrentVersion.description: Insider risk management is introducing one central location for all reports including analytics and user activity reports. Additional reports will also be available that will summarize trends in alerts generated and cases created. Sample reports include alerts generated over time, alerts actioned over time, alerts and cases generated by region and department, top triggering events of alerts generated, and average time to triage alerts and cases. The ability to filter reports will also be introduced. Users with the admin, analyst or investigator role will have access to view the new Alerts & cases report. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New Insider Risk Management Reporting Capabilities
OldVersion.description: Insider risk management is introducing one central location for all reports including analytics and user activity reports. Additional reports will also be available that will summarize trends in alerts generated and cases created. Sample reports include alerts generated over time, alerts actioned over time, alerts and cases generated by region and department, top triggering events of alerts generated, and average time to triage alerts and cases. The ability to filter reports will also be introduced. Users with the admin, analyst or investigator role will have access to view the new Alerts & cases report. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title:
Microsoft Teams: Updates to Gallery
View in Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The updated Gallery View in Teams Rooms on Windows arranges all participants in consistent tile sizes, prioritizes video on the meeting stage, offers additional layout options, optimizes for single and dual displays, and provides a unified meeting experience across both Teams Rooms and desktop.

OldVersion.title:
Microsoft Teams: Updates to Gallery
View in Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: The updated Gallery View in Teams Rooms on Windows arranges all participants in consistent tile sizes, prioritizes video on the meeting stage, offers additional layout options, optimizes for single and dual displays, and provides a unified meeting experience across both Teams Rooms and desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto detection of room audio in BYOD rooms expanded to audio devices with video
CurrentVersion.description: The room audio auto-detect and pre-select feature for BYOD rooms that was released in October 2024 now activates the video component of composite audio-video peripherals as the selected camera in Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto detection of room audio in BYOD rooms expanded to audio devices with video
OldVersion.description: The room audio auto-detect and pre-select feature for BYOD rooms that was released in October 2024 now activates the video component of composite audio-video peripherals as the selected camera in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: New Queue experience in Bookings to manage appointments for the day with real time attendee wait status and SMS reminders
CurrentVersion.description: The new Queue experience in Bookings enables schedulers and Bookings users to view the status and monitor all scheduled in-person and virtual appointments. Users can quickly create or view an appointment and send staff and attendees email reminders and SMS text notifications.

OldVersion.title: Bookings: New Queue experience in Bookings to manage appointments for the day with real time attendee wait status and SMS reminders
OldVersion.description: The new Queue experience in Bookings enables schedulers and Bookings users to view the status and monitor all scheduled in-person and virtual appointments. Users can quickly create or view an appointment and send staff and attendees email reminders and SMS text notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together Mode New Flow
CurrentVersion.description: Together mode will get a new simplified flow which will take the user from the beginning to the end through the steps of setting up the scene, assigning the seats and applying for everyone in the call in a transparent and easy-to-understand way. The function itself does not change but there will be more transparency thanks to the icons on the meeting toolbar for an easy access for each next step in the familiar Together mode flow.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together Mode New Flow
OldVersion.description: Together mode will get a new simplified flow which will take the user from the beginning to the end through the steps of setting up the scene, assigning the seats and applying for everyone in the call in a transparent and easy-to-understand way. The function itself does not change but there will be more transparency thanks to the icons on the meeting toolbar for an easy access for each next step in the familiar Together mode flow.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Account descriptions
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook users can now set custom descriptions for their accounts, making them easier to tell apart in the folder list and various lists and menus across the application. The description can be set in the account settings. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Account descriptions
OldVersion.description: Outlook users can now set custom descriptions for their accounts, making them easier to tell apart in the folder list and various lists and menus across the application. The description can be set in the account settings. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Navigate meetings and messages hands-free with Teams in CarPlay
CurrentVersion.description: Stay connected on the move with Teams in CarPlay. Use Siri to respond to notifications and send messages in Teams. Easily join meetings and engage in discussions with quick actions like raising your hand.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Navigate meetings and messages hands-free with Teams in CarPlay
OldVersion.description: Stay connected on the move with Teams in CarPlay. Use Siri to respond to notifications and send messages in Teams. Easily join meetings and engage in discussions with quick actions like raising your hand.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Discover all prompt collections in the new Copilot Prompt Gallery app within Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: The new Copilot Prompt Gallery app provides a central place to find, save, and share prompts available from Microsoft 365 Copilot apps and agents. You can also explore and use a curated selection of suggested prompts organized by role, function, or industry. This app will be available on Teams, Outlook and www.microsoft365.com.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Discover all prompt collections in the new Copilot Prompt Gallery app within Microsoft 365
OldVersion.description: The new Copilot Prompt Gallery app provides a central place to find, save, and share prompts available from Microsoft 365 Copilot apps and agents. You can also explore and use a curated selection of suggested prompts organized by role, function, or industry. This app will be available on Teams, Outlook and www.microsoft365.com.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Increasing policy template limits for Insider Risk Management
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management will increase policy creation limits from 20 policies per template to 100 maximum overall active policies. For example, an organization may have 50 data leak policy templates because the limit will now apply to all active policies versus each policy template. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Increasing policy template limits for Insider Risk Management
OldVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management will increase policy creation limits from 20 policies per template to 100 maximum overall active policies. For example, an organization may have 50 data leak policy templates because the limit will now apply to all active policies versus each policy template. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - General availability of Microsoft partner data connectors for T-Mobile and HKCSL
CurrentVersion.description: These connectors will support ingestion for T-Mobile and HKCSL data to user mailboxes and makes them available for compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - General availability of Microsoft partner data connectors for T-Mobile and HKCSL
OldVersion.description: These connectors will support ingestion for T-Mobile and HKCSL data to user mailboxes and makes them available for compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Add Allow/Off mode for each Action type overall enforcement
CurrentVersion.description: With Off, Endpoint DLP will not fire any event/Alert and will not trigger any toast. The customer can use this enforcement mode to have restriction for a specific group. With Allow, Endpoint DLP will not fire any Alert and will not trigger any toast but will fire an event on Activity Explorer. Currently, Endpoint DLP only supports Audit only, Block, and Block With override.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Add Allow/Off mode for each Action type overall enforcement
OldVersion.description: With Off, Endpoint DLP will not fire any event/Alert and will not trigger any toast. The customer can use this enforcement mode to have restriction for a specific group. With Allow, Endpoint DLP will not fire any Alert and will not trigger any toast but will fire an event on Activity Explorer. Currently, Endpoint DLP only supports Audit only, Block, and Block With override.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop workspaces for Microsoft 365 GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Loop workspaces and the full Loop app experience are available to Microsoft 365 GCC customers at loop.cloud.microsoft.
